column4: you can always just install a different version of php in /usr/local/bin, but then again it might be in any number of the libs that PHP depends on
I'd use debian if you don't want your server to break twice a year
it's my desktop, i have gentoo on the server
i have php5.3 dev in /usr/local/bin because *apparently* it doesn't leak _as much_ (but it does...)
